page.title: 04TOURISM IN STOURPORT
page.content: Much nearer than the seaside,people visit Stourport during the Summer to enjoy the many facets the area has to offer.Apart from day trips,travelling mainly by car many people spend holidays in{caravans,chalets and tents around the area.General attractions include{fishing,boat trips,sailing, {rowing,swimming pool,fun fair and {amusements,picnic areas and restaurant {facilities,walks,bowls,tennis and {parks. Stourport also serves as a centre for{Wyre Forest,Hartlebury Common, canal holidays,carnivals and {International regattas,}jazz band and flower shows.Organized events are staged most weekends on the riverside. The area benifits from the{Severn {Valley Railway,Safari Park,}museums and historic buildings throughout the area.
